summary: This document discusses Court Foster Wood and his association with Michael Weimer Stratton. It details Stratton's knowledge of Wood's activities, including his interest in Cuba and association with individuals considered 'beatnik types.' The memo requests the FBI to provide any additional information concerning Court Foster Wood and his association with Michael Weimer Stratton.
title: COURT FOSTER WOOD INTERNAL SECURITY - CUBA
sender: R. L. Bannerman, Acting Director of Security
